p: Another main point is represented by the evolution and the adaptive mutations of the virus [ 6]. Indeed, the presence of SARS-CoV-2 Spike mutations can affect the interaction with the human epithelial cell receptors Angiotensin Converting Enzyme 2 (ACE2). The question of whether this would correspond to a novel and more potent COVID-19 specificities eventually requiring the development of wider-spectrum anti-SARS-CoV-2 strategies, such as vaccines or antiviral drugs, remains open [ 7, 8, 9].
